subSections.title: Glyph origin
subSections.text:
{{Han etym}}
{{liushu|i}}: a tree ({{zh-l|*木}}) with its bottom highlighted with an extra stroke, accentuating the roots; contrast {{zh-l|*本|}}, {{zh-l|*朱}}.

subSections.title: Readings
Compounds
Counter
subSections.text:
{{ja-pos|ほん|counter}}

# long [[cylindrical]] things such as glasses of drink, pairs of jeans, pens or [[trains]] and [[bus|buses]]
# [[films]] or TV shows
# [[home runs]] or [[goals]]
# [[rounds]] of a match in [[boxing]], [[wrestling]] or [[judo]]
